_comment: Example JSON output for plugin analysis by PI Pathfinder
query: Summarize the key findings from the latest IPCC report on climate change and suggest potential mitigation strategies.

selected_plugin.name: Research Assistant
selected_plugin.description: A powerful research tool for accessing and summarizing information from various online sources.
selected_plugin.reasoning: This plugin is best suited for the task because it can access the IPCC report online, summarize its findings, and identify relevant mitigation strategies from reputable sources.

extracted_skills.skill_description: Condenses large documents into concise summaries highlighting key information.
extracted_skills.implementation_details: Utilizes advanced NLP techniques to identify and extract the most important information, including sentence scoring and topic modeling.

extracted_skills.skill_description: Extracts data from web pages, including text, tables, and images.

parameters.url: URL of the IPCC report website

extracted_skills.implementation_details: Uses a robust web scraping library to handle various website structures and anti-scraping measures.

execution_plan.action: Use Web Scraping to extract the text content from the IPCC report webpage.
execution_plan.expected_outcome: Successful extraction of the IPCC report text.

execution_plan.action: Use Document Summarization to generate a summary of the extracted text, focusing on key findings and mitigation strategies.
execution_plan.expected_outcome: A concise summary of the IPCC report's key findings and mitigation strategies.

execution_plan.action: Return the generated summary to the user.
execution_plan.expected_outcome: User receives a helpful summary of the IPCC report.

alternative_plugins.name: Web Search
alternative_plugins.description: Performs web searches and retrieves relevant snippets.
alternative_plugins.reason: Useful for finding general information, but less effective for in-depth document analysis.

alternative_plugins.name: Document Reader
alternative_plugins.reason: Not applicable as the IPCC report is likely online.

potential_issues: Summarization may miss subtle nuances in the report.
overall_assessment.recommendations: Review the generated summary for accuracy and consult the original report for a complete understanding.
